root.title: True False
root.question:
This is a true false page type - it allows you to have multiple statements followed by a true false selection.

As with other scoring page types, if you omit the scenario text the layout will be displayed across the full width.

item.statement: Statement one (true) - please choose true or false. You can also have "why feedback" at the statement level as seen on the previous page.

item.text: This is the correct feedback. Tell the learner why this is correct.
This is the incorrect feedback for any attempt that is not the final attempt. You might give the learner more information and an encouraging message to retry.
This is the final incorrect feedback. Here you might tell the learner which was the correct answer and why.
